title: The Wicked You Sink Into This Love
summary:
Evelyn marries Wilfred to help her sickly sister.

Wilfred is popular in high society and wealthy, but continues to cheat on her even after their marriage. However,
when he returns home, he embraces Evelyn.

"Have you grown tired of me? So why do you make love to me?"

Evelyn is troubled by her relationship with Wilfred. She
thought it was a loveless marriage, but Wilfred's deeper intentions begin to emerge...

The story of a married couple who love each other but deceive each other begins now.

title: I Thought It’s a Common Possession
summary: I was the villainess who would die at the hands of the male lead, but I know this is a cliché! I thought it was a pretty good deal to die unjustly, as a payment for the price I paid for being the villainess. Until I realized that I couldn’t escape from the original plotline. If I was going to die anyway according to the original, then let’s give a kiss to my handsome husband!… Why did the original plot start to change?

title: Ready Shoot, For love
summary:
"Do you agree with this love, or are you very much against it?" 

What would you do if you finally found the love of your dreams but it is someone you shouldn't have fallen in love with? 

Ichibana is a girl who is a little bit girly and a little bit hot-tempered. She falls in love with Maki, a plain boy in her class, but just as she is about to confess her feelings to him, she finds out, to her surprise that he has a girlfriend!

title: Three Months of Summer
summary: This is a story about two girls who live in the corner of their class and enjoy their summer vacation. This is a short update project for the month of August. During this period, the story will progress as 'real time' = in-world time. The story will be updated only during the month of August.

title: Marriage with the Archduke, I Know Now
Tiger Cub
summary:
The kid next door came back as an adult. What he is aiming for.. is my ♡♡..?!

Choi In-ho, the kid next door who took care of him when he was young, appears in the basement of this ordinary office worker. Due to In-ho's fraud (?), he suddenly ends up living in the basement.

Inho, who has been in love with the kid since his childhood, tries to seduce him, but fails once and for all..

What do we do to flirt with this dull brother?!

title: The Secret Game of Nobles
summary: An all-color alternate story of the original classic, Space Adventure Cobra.

title: Even though you know it’s crazy
Necromancer’s Evolutionary Traits
summary:
After clearing the game Peccata for the twelfth time, Kim Jinhwan finds himself inside its world as Adrias Cromwell, a weak and cowardly character who always ends up dead!

With six months left until he gets killed along with his master for practicing forbidden magic, Adrias starts training and gathering corpses to better his necromancy, determined to survive. 

But will this long-time gamer's necromancy skills and pre-existing knowledge be enough to change the sequence of events?

title: Bloody Marriage
summary:
Scarlett was a happy girl. With beautiful looks, a wealthy family, and even a kind fiancé, Scarlett was expected to be the most beautiful bride in the world. But on the morning of her wedding day, the pure-white bride was killed by someone. When she opened her eyes again, everything was different.   
  
"I've told you many times before. It's because I'm Scarlett Antwerp!"   
  
"I'm sorry, but the Esteemed Daughter of the Count, Lady Entwerp, is already dead."   
  
Waking up in a strange place, Scarlett could not understand what had happened to her. Why couldn't anyone recognize her? Why was her fiancé standing next to another woman? Why was she Vivian instead of Scarlett, the Esteemed Daughter of the Count? Why was the one next to her not her fiancé Edward, but Alexis, the police chief? Scarlett swore that she'd get her fiancé back and get revenge on the one who killed her.

title: The Saintess Returns as a Villain
summary: Beatrice has lived as a saint for 10 years to prevent the disaster of the empire and win the love of her family. One day, her place as a saint was taken away by a girl named Lina Cumbell with her black hair... “I will kill you, your family, and all your followers.” She is framed as a warlock and executed. Beatrice's second life began like that. “Even if this life becomes a villainess… Lina, I will avenge you!!” The new life of Riche, a true saint who decided to become a villain, is redrawn.

title: Everyone’s Darling
summary:
_"In my class, there is a true idol."_

A first-year high school student at an ultra-elite school, Hiruno has to be the top student in his class according to his strict mother's order, but when he fails to fill in his first achievement test, he gets a red mark and has to take a remedial class. However, there is another participant in the remedial class...?

title: Bed Partner
summary: Still single at age 33, Haruki Shiina is standing at the biggest crossroads of her life. While unlucky in love, she's popular among her female coworkers for her laidback and boyish personality. The only one who gives her the cold shoulder is Risa Takagai, a beautiful and capable new hire who is already climbing her way up the corporate ladder. Haruki sees her as her biggest rival and is sure that the feeling is mutual, but why does Risa always seem to be watching her...?

title: The Real Daughter, She Is an Almighty Boss
summary: A highly skilled fighter wakes up in someone else's body and discovers that she's the Huffmans' lost daughter Gemma, regarded as socially inferior to her adoptive sister and a human punching bag for her Aunt Elodie. Her father doesn't care about her. Her mother is ashamed of her. Just when everyone thinks Gemma is going to make a complete fool of herself, they get a slap in the face.

title: My Wicked Little Girl
summary: One day, Charlotte Bennett transferred to Aoyagi Akihito's class. Her proper and refined mannerisms and adorable appearance captured the hearts of his classmates, but Akihito calmly takes a step back, feeling that she "lives in a different world." However, helping Charlotte's lost sister, Emma, throws his daily life into upheaval...?!

title: Spirit of the Dead
summary: Daisy von Preslaria, born in a viscount family that produces excellent magicians, was the only one in the family that was granted the failure job, Alchemist. Since this has happened, she's going to try studying hard and becoming independent as a worthy alchemist! The five-year-old girl so resolved and began to make potions by trial and error. Thanks to the Appraisal skill that she secretly possessed, let alone failures, her finished products were of such high quality never seen anywhere! She cultivated medicinal herbs, indulged herself in research, went harvesting, and opened a store.

title: I Have No Intention of Dating
summary: "I want to live a simple life." Dohui wants to live as she always has, and her co-worker Dong-i likes to be alone. They have no intention of dating anyone in their workplace... Or do they? We invite you to the intimacy of two people who keep encountering each other.

title: A Campus Romance, I Guess
summary:
An ordinary university student, Hayoon. She meets Kang-on on a trip for which she leaves on impulse. 

Kang-on falls in love at first sight with Hayoon and confesses to her but she rejects him. The two who thought they would never see each other again are reunited during a university club recruitment event...and end up joining the same club. But wait..the president of the club they joined likes Hayoon too?!

Lol this isn't made up but really just a campus romance...I guess.

title: Starting Over With the Dead You
summary: Getting reincarnated into the world of a novel is never easy, but possessing a doomed bride on her way down the aisle to marry a murderous emperor is just unfair! Now, the newly reincarnated Angelica has no choice but to learn to survive the whims of her new husband, Emperor Ranielo… Well, at least until he falls for his fated love interest and she can slip away unnoticed. But as the days pass, Ranielo’s interest in her only grows. Can this tyrant be tamed, or will Angelica find that some destinies can’t be unwritten?

title: Just A Cat
summary:
In a world of monsters and magic, the hunter Hawk and just a cat set off on an adventure— "One to protect what is precious, the other to seek revenge."

Different purposes, same destination.

title: Esteemed Female Masters All Want to Possess Me
summary: Xiao Nan died tragically and then isekai-ed to the 21st Continent. Although reborn as useless trash, he awakened the reverse system, and his strength would increase as long as he was hurt. What he didn’t know was that he had a hidden identity-as the chosen son of heaven who was prophesized to revitalize the Sword sect. The elders of all factions in the sect therefore hid their identities and approached Xiao Nan to try to recruit him into their own ranks. Since then, Xiao Nan began to enjoy being nurtured by beautiful female masters, whilst discovering features of the system to become stronger + start a harem

title: I Reincarnated As The Crazed Heir
summary:
Once a rising martial arts master, Jagak Yang is known as the Ten Strike Finisher due to his ability to defeat any opponent within ten moves. Jagak is also the son of the leader of the Great Martial Alliance, an organization of virtuous martial arts sects. His future leadership over the martial arts world seems all but assured -- that is, until he is assassinated by jealous rivals! Jagak is reincarnated into the body of Cheonso Ma, the playboy second-in-command of the evil Shining Light Cult. Can Jagak remain true to his principles despite his new life on the dark side?

---

**Links:**
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/fantasy/reincarnated-as-an-unruly-heir/list?title_no=3308)
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/chongshengbuliangshaojiaozhu/list?title_no=1850)
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001695)

title: Reincarnator
summary:
There was an inn with an urban legend among adventurers. "The Inn that won't let you die if you stay there."  
  
Loretta arrives at the inn as part of her quest. What is the secret of the "Deathless Inn?"  
  
"Save Point."  
  
It was an inn ran by an maxed out adventurer with the ability to create "Save Points" who came from another world. He retired from being an adventurer and decided to run an inn, while training newbie adventurers. Loretta, who needs to become strong, will be trained by the innkeeper, Alexander.  
  
If you die, don't worry about it, just hit load!  
  
  
**TL;DR**:   
Isekai + RPG Save Points + POV of a Native instead of the OP Otherworlder  


---

**WN Series Raw (12 different works)**:   
<https://ncode.syosetu.com/s1747d/>

title: World’s Strongest Survivor
summary:
"It isn't the strongest who survives. The one who survives is the strongest."

After being discharged from the military, Jin Seowoon did nothing but play games like a loser. One day, he was invited to the world of "Cloyd Survival," which resembled a game he enjoyed.

In that world were masters of martial arts, kings from other worlds, and notorious killers...

It was a gathering of monsters that surpassed human imagination.

Jin Seowoon had just one objective — to survive and become one of the top ten.

title: The Veteran Healer Is Overpowered
summary: Top Korean hunter Siu 'The Rabid Hound' Min defeated the Demon Lord with his disciples, only to be trapped in a monster-filled otherworld for 100 years. However, a century of struggles did not break Siu—it drove him to break his limits instead. Now, he returns to Earth with Pred, his mysterious partner, only to learn that his name and legacy have been erased, along with his disciples’... and that only 10 years have passed on Earth. As new conflicts arise, will Siu and Pred prevail and uncover the truth?

title: Demonic Evolution
summary: Aang, the strongest human warrior on the verge of death, has inexplicably travelled 60 years into the past, with the double-edged sword of the “strongest demon” power hidden inside him. “The only way to escape the fate of the pastis to evolve. Aang: “Don’t let yourself be a slave to your limits, break free and become a demon that reigns!

title: I Can’t Escape From My Contract Husband’s Doting Love
Bad Ending Maker
summary:
“Please write your resignation, Mr. Mincheol.” 

Mincheol’s game Wings Online is going to be ruined for the sake of profit! But the new General Director has forgotten one thing: Mincheol knows every nook and cranny of his virtual world.

Together with his trusty AI sidekick Oasis, will Mincheol be able to enact his revenge and create a Bad Ending for Wings Online’s season 6 update?

title: I Don’t Need You Anymore
summary:
After being defeated and captured, the dragon slayer Leon became a captive of the Silver Dragon Queen. With the awareness of death, he used forbidden magic to curse the queen, but unexpectedly, the queen lost control. 

He thought that this would make the queen live with shame for the rest of her life, and it would be worthy of the dragon slayer's mission. 

But two years later, when Leon opened his eyes, next to him was a little dragon girl with a tail...

title: The Fake Bride Can’t Escape
summary:
A pushy romantic comedy about a god who has been sleeping for 200 years and a positive JK!

Yui, a JK who has been able to see ghosts since she was a child, has an unrequited love on a god whom she has never met but who is loved by all ghosts. She spends her time dreaming of meeting him someday, but then the god, who has been asleep for 200 years after his fiancée ran away from him, finally wakes up.

Yui immediately proposes to the god, but...?

title: Villainess with a 0% Survival Rate
summary:
If you make the wrong choice, you will die instantly! The worst Otome game ever with death is about to begin!

One day, the protagonist receives an email from her former best friend saying, “I finished developing the game we used to make together, and I’d like for you to play it.” However, the day after playing the game, she wakes up and finds herself as “Diana,” the villainess of the game! Moreover, she has entered the “extra mode,” in which Diana is the heroine! In this mode, her favorability with the male characters starts in the negatives, all of them seem to resent Diana.

Can Diana survive this game of death?

title: How I, the Royal Spy, Won Over Five Princes
What Remains in the Damaged Place
My ex-husband wants to reconcile
summary: Ye Linghan’s wish to remarry his ex-husband, Ji Ran, turned the latter from an Alpha to an Omega. Despite enduring the physical changes and the pain of rejection, Ji Ran also endured Ye Linghan’s repeated hurtful behavior. When Ye Linghan finally divorced him, Ji Ran was left heartbroken. As for Ye Linghan, he got what he wanted, but upon looking at the empty villa, he suddenly came to his senses.

title: Son’s Retribution
summary:
Blood ties bind, but vengeance severs, and in the heart of a heartless man, a fire ignites.

Kang Piludu, a prosecutor born into a legacy of corruption, uncovers his family's harrowing involvement in his mother’s murder. Now, a chilling vendetta awakens the monster within, drawing out the primordial urge he has long sought to contain. 

Will he rely on the law to be his ally on this treacherous path, or will he become the judge, jury, and executioner?

title: Even though I become a side character, I’m being adored by an overprotective duke
summary:
*I was reincarnated as a mob character from an otome game, and my fiancé is a handsome duke.*

I've been transmigrated as "Leticia," a mob character from an otome game. I was forced to take Lionel as my fiancé by my twin sister (who, by the way, has the worst personality). The first time I met Lionel, he was nothing but chubby and fat, just as the rumours said he'd be… However, me being me, I realised that Lionel is an unpolished gem with potential to shine, so I decided to re-invent him. Even if I'm a mob character, my days of doting on my fiancé began when my fiancé transformed both inside and out.

---
*I was reborn... as a background character in a romance game?! And my fiancé is a hot duke?!*

Reincarnated as 'Leticia,' a background character in a game, I found out that my twin sister, who has a horrible personality, pawned her fiancé, Lionel, off on me. When I first met Lionel, he was just as chubby as I'd heard... But I soon realized he was a diamond in the rough and decided to make him shine!

But that's when I discovered that my newly hot fiancé is acting like he's head over heels for me...!

title: Mysterious Village
summary:
Mumyeong Heo’s grandmother passed away years ago. But when he visits her home to spend some time in the quiet countryside, he notices that someone kept it clean all this time.
His new neighbors aren’t exactly thrilled by his visit. In fact, most of them don’t want him around.
But that’s when his nasty neighbors go missing one by one… for better or worse.

title: God-level Assassin, I’m the Shadow
summary:
In a world where people sleep and enter the realm abandoned by God, Qin Feng, who had sacrificed everything for his sister, is betrayed by her.
However, fate grants him a second chance, sending him back nine years before the abandoned world appears.
This time, Qin Feng chooses to abandon his sister and focus on becoming the strongest.

(Source: MangaUpdates)

title: The Ten Thousand Races Invasion: Guardian of the Rear
summary: Invasion of the Ten Thousand Clans, universal superpowers, the era beyond time has arrived! In this age, all citizens are drafted to resist the foreign races and defend against external humiliation. Nan Ziying, at the tender age of adulthood, chooses to stay behind at the recruitment center, serving as logistical support. Many soldiers are disappointed, the youth scorn him, and white-haired elders take up arms and leave, leaving him behind with only women, children, and the elderly to guard the rear. Later, Nan Ziying awakens five great abilities and silently prepares. In this era where countless clans reign supreme and the times are filled with tragic heroism, ‘I am the calamity of these ten thousand clans!'

title: God of the Apocalypse
summary:
"An opportunity's an opportunity, no matter how slimy these gods who grant them may be. If they want a show, I'll give them one!"

Zephyr is the last human fighting evil in a world abandoned by the gods. When he is killed in battle by Tartarus, the god of destruction, all hope for humanity seems lost.

But Zephyr's fate is not sealed - the gods who find his battles entertaining have gifted him a second chance at life, as he is sent ten years into the past, back to when he was a slave instead of the most powerful human alive.

Can Zephyr get his revenge against Tartarus and save the woman he loves, or is he doomed to repeat the past?

---
[Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BOqe_XcNCBo)

title: Hades & Persephone
summary: This series including fanfic short stories about the famous couple in Greek mythology- Hades and Persephone and some other couples as well.

title: Arrogant Regret
summary: After her noble family falls to ruin, Stella Embrose does whatever she can to make ends meet. But her departure from high society only sparks rumors about her supposed messy relationships with men. These false rumors reach the ears of Duke Callian Rochester, Stella’s unrequited first love and her husband-to-be under the emperor’s ploy to keep him in check. Believing Stella to be unworthy of him, Callian hands her a contract stating they will divorce in three years. Will this be enough time for Callian to be unblinded by his pride and see Stella for who she truly is?

title: Embrace My Shadow
summary: An innocent girl named Coco and her meeting with the cold but intriguing CEO, Beiming. As political and corporate families clash, love joins the fray and things get even more complicated. Love, revenge, the corporate world, and a twisted, captivating story of two intriguing lovers!

title: It’s Your Fault for Being Poor: The Fallen Noble Lady Faces the Consequences of a Broken Engagement
Winterbell
summary:
One of the four dragons called upon to maintain the balance of the world—the Guardian Dragon of Winter, Seherbian Winterbell. Over time, he grows weary and jaded, burdened by a world that always prays to winter for fear, curses, and misfortune. But when the Dragon Priest who watched over him for years, Rowan, dies, Winterbell decides to finally honor his last wish by stepping out into the world...

"I hope you’ll come to know more of this world.
My dragon, Winterbell."

title: Rapid Mana Recovery
summary: Ye Yu, a physically weak boy who loves basketball, accidentally unlocks his hidden physical potential after drinking a mysterious beverage. Rising from an unknown underdog, he transforms into a basketball prodigy capable of competing against technologically enhanced athletes. Alongside his teammates, he defends the purity of sports with passion and conviction, igniting a blood-pumping journey on the court! With willpower as his blade and awakened energy recovery, this isn’t just about basketball—it’s a head-on clash between youth and destiny.
